abstract: New York State Appeals Court revives most of Macy's lawsuit accusing J C Penney of interfering improperly with its exclusive merchandising contracts with Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia.
lead_paragraph: A court revived most of Macy’s lawsuit accusing J. C. Penney of interfering improperly with its exclusive merchandising contract with Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia.

headline.main: Judge Revives Macy’s Suit Against J.C. Penney
headline.print_headline: Judge Revives Macy’s Suit Against J.C. Penney

snippet: A court revived most of Macy’s lawsuit accusing J. C. Penney of interfering improperly with its exclusive merchandising contract with Martha Stewart Living Omnimedia.
